sense.def:
Z besedo
thus
uvedemo posledice ali sklep tistega, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: They are down to their last 2,000 pounds and thus qualify for social security benefits.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
thus
ali da se nekaj dogaja
thus
, mislimo, da je tako ali se dogaja tako, kot opisujemo.

seg.quote: She lay down. Her eyelids closed. It was thus that Robert saw her.
Thus encouraged, Lexington walked through the gate.
